intake.title: Describe your problem
intake.subtitle: Tell us about the problem you want to solve. We'll get back to you within 48 hours.

form.title: Title
form.titlePlaceholder: Short and clear: what's the core problem?
form.problemDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe the problem in detail. What's happening now? What are the consequences?
form.desiredOutcomePlaceholder: What would the ideal situation look like? How do you define success?
form.optional: Optional fields - help us understand you better

confirmation.title: Thank you!
confirmation.message: Your request has been received. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

validation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

pricing.title: [EN] Choose the plan that fits you
pricing.subtitle: [EN] Start free and upgrade when you're ready.

items.question: [EN] Can I upgrade or downgrade anytime?
items.answer: [EN] Yes, you can change your plan at any time.

items.question: [EN] Is there a free trial?
items.answer: [EN] The Free plan is always free. Pro and Studio have a 14-day trial.

items.question: [EN] What are micro-solutions?
items.answer: [EN] Small, focused software solutions we build based on the problems you submit.

contact.title: [EN] Need an enterprise solution?
contact.subtitle: [EN] Contact us for a custom plan for your organization.
